sentences.en: Between them they finished cutting three carloads of macaroni stalks.
sentences.cn: 他们协力割下了3车通心粉秸.

sentences.en: Fratelli, the present champion of Calabrian - macaroni - eating competition, eats like a horse.
sentences.cn: 拉泰利, 当今卡拉布里亚吃通心粉比赛的冠军, 胃口像马一样大.

sentences.en: He sat down to a great dish of macaroni.
sentences.cn: 他坐下来吃了一大碗通心粉.

sentences.en: Here you can see two workers who, between them, have just finished cutting three cart - loads of golden brown macaroni stalks.
sentences.cn: 在这里,你可以看到两个劳动者, 他们俩协力割下了三车金黄色的通心面秸.

sentences.en: Macaroni has been grown in this area for over six hundred years.
sentences.cn: 这个地区种植通心粉已有六百余年的历史.
通心面的味道与意大利细面条不同.

sentences.en: Macaroni, spaghetti, and vermicelli are all types of pasta.
sentences.cn: 通心粉, 义大利面条, 和细面条都是义大利面食的种类.

sentences.en: Maybe you'd like the macaroni and cheese.
sentences.cn: 也许你想要通心粉和乳酪.

sentences.en: Some things were quite nice, but I didn't care much for the macaroni dishes.
sentences.cn: 有些东西很好, 但我不大喜欢意大利通心粉.

sentences.en: Steve: I like to eat macaroni and cheese sometimes.
sentences.cn: 史提夫: 有些时候我喜欢吃起士通心粉.

sentences.en: There were few provisions available in exchange for food stamps: ersatz coffee, macaroni, small cubes of margarine.
sentences.cn: 可以用来换取粮票的食物只有这些：代用咖啡、通心粉和小块的人造黄油。

sentences.en: They tend to buy cheap processed foods like canned chicken and macaroni.
sentences.cn: 他们往往会买便宜的加工食品，像鸡肉罐头和通心粉之类的。

sentences.en: Upon completion , drain the water from the macaroni and put aside.
sentences.cn: 煮好后, 将水沥乾,通心面至于一旁备用.

sentences.en: We are going over to the macaroni field of Calabria.
sentences.cn: 我们现在到克拉布利亚的通心粉田里.

sentences.en: Yankee doodle stuck a feather in his cap and called it macaroni.
sentences.cn: Yankeedoodle帽上插根羽毛,称为时髦帅哥.

words.tran_cn: 通心粉；通心面条；纨绔子弟

trans.tran_en: a type of  pasta  in the shape of small tubes
